languages.text: Монастырь Адептус Механикус расположен на отдалении от ульев Райкада Минорис, на территориях, дарованных в управление Духовенству Марса. Ввиду масштабных волнений на планете, метод орбитального десантирования рекомендован как оптимальный способ достичь монастыря.

The monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus is situated in remote territories gifted to the Priesthood of Mars, away from the hives of Rykad Minoris. Due to the scale of the planetary rebellion, descending from orbit is considered the optimal way to reach the monastery.
languages.original_text: Монастырь Адептус Механикус расположен на отдалении от ульев Райкада Минорис, на территориях, дарованных в управление Духовенству Марса. Ввиду масштабных волнений на планете, метод орбитального десантирования рекомендован как оптимальный способ достичь монастыря.

traits.locale_text: The monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus is situated on the secluded territories gifted to the Priesthood of Mars, away from the hives of Rykad Minoris. Due to the scale of the planetary rebellion, dropping from orbit is considered the optimal way to reach the monastery.

The monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus is situated in remote territories gifted to the Priesthood of Mars, away from the hives of Rykad Minoris. Due to the scale of the planetary rebellion, descending from orbit is considered the optimal way to reach the monastery.

The monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus is situated in remote territories gifted to the Priesthood of Mars, away from the hives of Rykad Minoris. Due to the scale of the planetary rebellion, descending from orbit is considered the optimal way to reach the monastery.

languages.text: Das Kloster des Adeptus Mechanicus befindet sich in einem abgelegenen Gebiet, das der Priesterschaft des Mars geschenkt wurde, abseits der Makropolen von Rykad Minoris. Aufgrund des Ausmaßes der Rebellion auf dem Planeten ist der Abstieg aus dem Orbit der optimale Weg, um das Kloster zu erreichen.
languages.original_text: The monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus is situated in remote territories gifted to the Priesthood of Mars, away from the hives of Rykad Minoris. Due to the scale of the planetary rebellion, descending from orbit is considered the optimal way to reach the monastery.

traits.locale_text: Das Kloster des Adeptus Mechanicus befindet sich in einem abgelegenen Gebiet, das der Priesterschaft des Mars geschenkt wurde, abseits der Makropolen von Rykad Minoris. Aufgrund des Ausmaßes der Rebellion auf dem Planeten ist der Abstieg aus dem Orbit der optimale Weg, um das Kloster zu erreichen.

languages.text: Le monastère de l'Adeptus Mechanicus est situé sur des terres reculées qui furent offertes au clergé de Mars, loin des ruches de Rykad Minoris. L'ampleur de la rébellion planétaire est telle que le meilleur moyen d'atteindre le monastère est de s'y poser depuis l'espace.
languages.original_text: The monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus is situated in remote territories gifted to the Priesthood of Mars, away from the hives of Rykad Minoris. Due to the scale of the planetary rebellion, descending from orbit is considered the optimal way to reach the monastery.

traits.locale_text: Le monastère de l'Adeptus Mechanicus est situé sur des terres reculées qui furent offertes au clergé de Mars, loin des ruches de Rykad Minoris. L'ampleur de la rébellion planétaire est telle que le meilleur moyen d'atteindre le monastère est de s'y poser depuis l'espace.

languages.text: 机械修会的修道院坐落在远离小莱卡德巢都的偏远地区，在火星祭司的管辖之下。由于行星表面爆发了大规模叛乱，行商浪人最好能从空中前往修道院。
languages.original_text: The monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus is situated in remote territories gifted to the Priesthood of Mars, away from the hives of Rykad Minoris. Due to the scale of the planetary rebellion, descending from orbit is considered the optimal way to reach the monastery.

traits.locale_text: 机械修会的修道院坐落在远离小莱卡德巢都的偏远地区，在火星祭司的管辖之下。由于行星表面爆发了大规模叛乱，行商浪人最好能从空中前往修道院。

languages.text: 帝国技術局の修道院は、ライカド・ミノリスのハイヴから遠く離れている、火星の神官団に与えられた人里離れた領土にある。惑星の反乱の規模が大きいため、修道院にたどり着くには軌道上から降下するのが最適と考えられている。
languages.original_text: The monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus is situated in remote territories gifted to the Priesthood of Mars, away from the hives of Rykad Minoris. Due to the scale of the planetary rebellion, descending from orbit is considered the optimal way to reach the monastery.

traits.locale_text: 帝国技術局の修道院は、ライカド・ミノリスのハイヴから遠く離れている、火星の神官団に与えられた人里離れた領土にある。惑星の反乱の規模が大きいため、修道院にたどり着くには軌道上から降下するのが最適と考えられている。

languages.text: El monasterio del Adeptus Mechanicus está en un territorio remoto, encomendado al Sacerdocio de Marte y alejado de las colmenas de Rykad Minoris. Dada la magnitud de la rebelión, descender desde la órbita sería la ruta más segura hasta el lugar.
languages.original_text: The monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus is situated in remote territories gifted to the Priesthood of Mars, away from the hives of Rykad Minoris. Due to the scale of the planetary rebellion, descending from orbit is considered the optimal way to reach the monastery.

traits.locale_text: El monasterio del Adeptus Mechanicus está en un territorio remoto, encomendado al Sacerdocio de Marte y alejado de las colmenas de Rykad Minoris. Dada la magnitud de la rebelión, descender desde la órbita sería la ruta más segura hasta el lugar.

languages.text: Adeptus Mechanicus manastırı, Rykad Minoris'in merkezî şehirlerinden uzakta, Mars Rahipliği'ne armağan edilen gözlerden ırak bölgelerden birinde yer alıyor. Gezegen çapındaki ayaklanmalar sebebiyle manastıra ulaşmanın en ideal yolu, doğrudan yörüngeden alçalmaktan geçiyor.
languages.original_text: The monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus is situated in remote territories gifted to the Priesthood of Mars, away from the hives of Rykad Minoris. Due to the scale of the planetary rebellion, descending from orbit is considered the optimal way to reach the monastery.

traits.locale_text: Adeptus Mechanicus manastırı, Rykad Minoris'in merkezî şehirlerinden uzakta, Mars Rahipliği'ne armağan edilen gözlerden ırak bölgelerden birinde yer alıyor. Gezegen çapındaki ayaklanmalar sebebiyle manastıra ulaşmanın en ideal yolu, doğrudan yörüngeden alçalmaktan geçiyor.
